Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a healthy plant that has enough water and light.
The student can draw a plant that has no water, showing signs of not being healthy.
The student can draw a plant that has no light, showing it is unable to live or grow well.
The student can show through drawings that plants need both water and light to live and grow.
The student can identify and show patterns about plants needing water and light through their drawings.
